creditline: Gift of funds from Henry Roberts and Diane and David Lilly
description: Color image of yellow, brown and white bird in ULQ on a pine tree in a field of yellow and white daisies; separate printed specimen label beneath image; received matted and framed
markings: on back, on label: Paula McCartney / Bird Watching / Spotted Wren, 2008 / chromogenic print, printed 2011 / 19x19\" image on 28x23\" paper / edition of 7 / Paula McCartney (signature)
signed: on back, on label: (...) Paula McCartney
title: Spotted Wren, from "Bird Watching" series
